scripts.test: lean-test --preprocess tsc --parallel-suites src && tsc && prettier --check . && scripts/build.sh $npm_package_version
scripts.dopublish: scripts/build.sh $npm_package_version && echo 'Enter NPM one-time-passcode:' && read otp && npm publish --otp "$otp" --access public package-core.tgz && npm publish --otp "$otp" --access public package-dynamodb.tgz && npm publish --otp "$otp" --access public package-mongodb.tgz && npm publish --otp "$otp" --access public package-postgresql.tgz && npm publish --otp "$otp" --access public package-redis.tgz && npm publish --otp "$otp" --access public package-sqlite.tgz
